info.name: AutoHub - Car Marketplace Philippines API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for AutoHub Car Marketplace Platform.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication. Get your token from the `/api/v1/auth/login` or `/api/v1/auth/register` endpoints.

## Base URL
Local: `http://localhost:8000`

## User Roles
- **buyer**: Can browse cars, create inquiries, favorites
- **seller**: Can list and manage cars
- **dealer**: Business account with enhanced features
- **moderator**: Can moderate content
- **admin**: Full system access

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy
Get API information and available endpoints
Register a new user account. Returns JWT tokens.
Login with email and password. Returns access and refresh tokens.
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout current user and revoke refresh token
Verify email address with token from email
Request password reset. Sends email with reset token.
Reset password using token from email
Check if email is available for registration
Get all verification statuses for current user
Search cars with advanced filters including location-based search

body.raw:
{
  "title": "2020 Toyota Fortuner",
  "description": "Well-maintained SUV in excellent condition",
  "brand_id": 1,
  "model_id": 1,
  "year": 2020,
  "price": 1500000,
  "mileage": 45000,
  "fuel_type": "diesel",
  "transmission": "automatic",
  "condition_rating": "excellent",
  "city_id": 1,
  "negotiable": true,
  "financing_available": true
}

request.description: Create new car listing (requires seller/dealer role)
Get detailed information about a car. Records view count.
Update car listing (only owner can update)
Soft delete car listing (only owner can delete)
Upload image for car listing. Creates thumbnails automatically.
Boost car for increased visibility (requires subscription)
Get price change history for a car
Get all models for a specific brand
Upgrade buyer to seller or dealer role
Subscribe to a plan. Returns QR code for payment if payment_method is qr_code.
Submit payment reference number after QR code payment
Validate promo code and get discount amount
Upgrade to a higher subscription plan

{

request.description: Create inquiry about a car (authenticated or guest)
Get inquiries sent by current user
Get inquiries received by current user (as seller)
Get view analytics for a specific car
Get market insights and pricing data
